question: Which prayers are perfect to use with Tasbih?. Can you tell me any Dhikr or Salawat that I can use with Tasbih?. Where in the Quran we can find prayers for use with Tasbeeh?.
answer:
QUESTION
ANSWER


Share:
a) 1 Tasbih (100 beads) of Durood Shareef (Allaahumma Salli alaa muhammadi
wa alaa aali muhammadin kamaa sallayta alaa ibraaheema wa alaa aali
ibraaheema, innaka hameedun majeed)
b) 1 Tasbih of Third Kalima (Subhaana Allaahi wal hamdu lillaahi walaa
ilaaha illa Allaahu Wallaahu Akbar. Wa laa hawla walaa quwwata illaa
billaahil aliyy al-adheem)
c) 1 Tasbih of Istighfaar (Astaghfirullaaha llaadhee laa ilaaha illaa huwal
hayyul qayyoomu wa atoobu ilayhi)

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
FATWA DEPT.
